name: Idle Fortress Tower Defense
description:
You will become a great general to build a Base strong enough to resist all monsters. You can upgrade your Base to be stronger, faster, more and more skilled.
After each round, your stats will be reset and you will have more Gold to upgrade. you can go further after upgrading

Features:
- Awsome card with incredible power.
- So many stats you can upgrade.
- Many worlds to discover.
- Upgrade every week.
- Simulate defense tower resisit monsters.

If you get any problems, dont mind leave your comment, we will fix that.
Thank you so much!
